intro: Prenanthes denticulata, commonly known as the toothed bladderwort, is a flowering plant native to North America. It belongs to the Apiaceae family and is characterized by its finely divided, fern-like leaves. The plant produces small, yellowish-green flowers that bloom in late summer. It typically grows in moist soils along stream banks and wetlands. Prenanthes denticulata is often found in shaded to partially shaded environments.
